title: How one lonely clapper in Vancouver's West End sparked the 7 p.m. health-care workers salute
description: Rory Richards lives in the city's densely populated West End and thought it was the perfect place to start an appreciation movement, which has now spread across the province.
content:
The first night Rory Richards applauded health-care workers from her Vancouver apartment window, some of her neighbours actually shut theirs. 
Richards, a mom of twin toddlers who lives in the city's densely-populated West End neighbourhood, wanted to show h… [+3590 chars]
